markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Tempest Surge](/Spells.aspx?ID=1860)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 382 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You surround a foe in a swirling storm of violent winds, roiling clouds, and crackling lightning. The storm deals 1d12 electricity damage to the target with a basic Reflex save. On a failure, the target also is clumsy 2 for 1 round.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The initial damage increases by 1d12.
name: Tempest Surge

summary_markdown: You surround a foe in a swirling storm of violent winds, roiling clouds, and crackling lightning.
text: Tempest Surge Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 382 2.0 Range 30 feet Target 1 creature Defense basic Reflex --- You surround a foe in a swirling storm of violent winds, roiling clouds, and crackling lightning. The storm deals 1d12 electricity damage to the target with a basic Reflex save. On a failure, the target also is clumsy 2 for 1 round. --- Heightened (+1) The initial damage increases by 1d12.
